name: Crimson Earth
description: Hordes of Zombies have taken over the world. Your mission is simple, destroy all zombies and save the planet! But make sure you do it in style while listening to groovy tunes. Burn them, tear their limbs off, throw them off a cliff, pop their heads off or order an airstrike on the whole horde.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 400 series DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Quad Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
